overview:
David Lee is the CEO and founder of Virtuosant. He brings more than 20 years of leadership, consulting and software development experience. Since he established Virtuosant in January 2007, he has been focused on building a strong foundation consisting of products and a top notch team.

Previously, Mr. Lee architected and directed the development of IBM WebSphere portal solutions for MetLife, Inc.; US Department of the Interior; Borders; and Winn-Dixie Company. Mr. Lee has worked for both Lotus and IBM corporations, and earned a BBA/MIS degree with honors from Texas Tech University.
